summary: CORS fix for product images verified successfully. The /api/uploads/{folder}/{filename} endpoint correctly serves uploaded images with proper CORS headers (Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *). Product images display correctly on both products list page and product detail page.
passed_tests: API endpoint /api/uploads/images/{filename} returns HTTP 200 with correct Content-Type: image/jpeg
API endpoint returns CORS header: Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
PlayStation Plus product (ID: 4a1661e8-3bb5-448d-b703-43c4e24c9fc4) image loads correctly on products page
PlayStation Plus product image loads correctly on product detail page
No broken images found on products page (0 out of 50 products)
External images (unsplash) continue to work correctly
Products without uploaded images use external URLs correctly
critical_code_review_comments: CORS fix implemented correctly via /api/uploads/{folder}/{filename} endpoint in server.py (lines 287-316)
getImageUrl helper function in ProductCard.js and ProductDetailPage.js correctly handles /uploads/ prefix
FileResponse includes proper headers: Cache-Control and Access-Control-Allow-Origin
context_for_next_testing_agent:
CORS fix for product images verified:

1. Backend endpoint /api/uploads/{folder}/{filename} serves images with:
   - Correct Content-Type based on file extension
   - Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * header
   - Cache-Control: public, max-age=31536000

2. Frontend getImageUrl() function in both ProductCard.js and ProductDetailPage.js:
   - Transforms /uploads/... paths to ${API_URL}/uploads/... (which becomes /api/uploads/...)
   - External URLs (http/https) pass through unchanged
   - Null/empty URLs return placeholder

3. Test product with uploaded image:
   - Product: اشتراك PlayStation Plus - 12 شهر
   - ID: 4a1661e8-3bb5-448d-b703-43c4e24c9fc4
   - Image: /uploads/images/ee0757ba-cf75-4f97-8317-d83eff99ef4c.jpg

4. Available uploaded images in /app/backend/uploads/images/:
   - 5de8c447-77b8-4bc1-afbd-5364d2050a02.jpg
   - d2ac41be-29fd-4881-926c-33ca0333efc8.jpg
   - e9739bb6-be5f-40bc-8d96-d3843c7e6f1b.jpeg
